resources.string: 1. To use the application, make sure that you are connected to the internet.
2. The application can take 5 to 10 seconds to load the information of the book depending on the speed of your wi-fi connection.
3. When typing in one of the search-fields, if no suggestion is shown up then the book you are looking for is not in the database.
4. If you are not inside the library, you can use Global Positioning System to locate where the library is.
1. To use the Indoor Positioning System, make sure you have a solid internet connection and 3G/4G mobile network.

2. Indoor Positioning System requires three sensors which are: accelerometer, compass, and gyroscope. If any of the sensors are missing from your smartphone then the Indoor Positioning System will not work.
3. To verify if your smartphone has these sensors, download the below application called \"Sensor Box for Android\":
4. The application is portrait mode only and when you are inside Indoor Positioning System mode, make sure to hold your phone straight ahead in front of you and walk along:
5. Do not hold the phone in landscape mode or else the Indoor Positioning may not work.
6. When the Indoor Positioning System is started, the blue dot may take a small amount of time to converge to your actual position.

7. The Indoor Positioning System only works inside the library, and if you click on \"Indoor Map\" outside the library, the application will keep loading until you are inside the library. To go back to home screen,double tap the back button.
8. The red balloon which points to one of the bookshelves shows where your book is located.
